use internal packages setup in a projet

use_internal.Rd

use internal packages setup in a projet

use_internal(proj, name = whoami::fullname(),
  email = whoami::email_address(), pkg_dir = "./packages")

Arguments

proj

project name
name

name
email

email address
pkg_dir

directory for internal project packages

Examples

# NOT RUN {
# autodetection of user information
use_internal("Test Project")

# manual specification
use_internal("Test Project", "Devin Pastoor", "devin.pastoor@gmail.com")
# }

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples

Developed by Devin Pastoor.
